name: Innocent Blood
text: With their deaths, the pitiful wretches that inhabit this world open your path to greatness.
prerequisites: You must slay at least 50 intelligent noncombatants for either your own personal gain or for no cause at all, or have the Bloodthirsty, First Kill, or The Kill background.
benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on Intimidate checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in Intimidate, this bonus increases to +4. Each time you slay an intelligent creature, you gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls and caster level checks for 1 minute (this bonus does not stack with itself ).
goal: Slay at least 200 more intelligent noncombatants, then slay a challenging foe that seeks to either bring you to justice for your crimes or usurp your position.
completionBenefit: Any shaken creature takes double the normal penalties when attacking you, making saves against your abilities, or resolving skill checks with you as a target.
text_zh: 世间可悲者的灵魂，通过死亡为你开启了通往伟大之途。
prerequisites_zh: 你必须出于个人原因或毫无理由地击杀50个以上无战斗力的智慧生物；或拥有“嗜血如狂（Bloodthirsty）”、“杀人体验（First Kill）”、“天生杀手（The Kill）”等角色背景之一。
benefit_zh: 你的威吓检定+2。如果你在威吓技能受训10级以上，该加值升至+4。每当你击杀一个智慧生物，你的攻击检定和施法者等级检定+1，持续1分钟（该加值不与自身叠加）。
goal_zh: 击杀200个以上无战斗力的智慧生物，然后击杀一个想要将你绳之以法或取而代之的强大敌手。
completionBenefit_zh: 任何处于战栗状态下的生物攻击你、豁免你所施放的能力或以你为目标使用技能时受到的减值加倍。
